sentences.en: Astonishing lifelike blue eyes shone between lashes of real hair.
sentences.cn: 令人惊叹的栩栩如生的碧眼在真正的睫毛中闪烁.

sentences.en: But this awesome person is too lifelike to be a god.
sentences.cn: 但这个令人惊叹的形象实在太真实、太鲜活.

sentences.en: Cai Mingdian ding three decorative glass, works fine, burning exquisite, vivid, lifelike.
sentences.cn: 殿顶明代三彩琉璃装饰, 刀工细腻, 烧制精致, 形象逼真, 栩栩如生.

sentences.en: Decorative painting a clear picture , lifelike, as Reclaimer fine crystal, crystal clear.
sentences.cn: 装饰画画面清晰 、 栩栩如生, 水晶照取料上乘 、 晶莹剔透.

sentences.en: Mr. Zhang is an expert in making lifelike imitations.
sentences.cn: 张大爷是制作像生的专家.

sentences.en: On top of the bridge are 4 lifelike stone lions.
sentences.cn: 桥栏上还雕有四只栩栩如生的石狮.

sentences.en: She cut out the works, lifelike , lifelike, people would find it remarkable.
sentences.cn: 她剪出的作品, 惟妙惟肖, 栩栩如生, 让人称奇.

sentences.en: The galloping horses he paints are extremely lifelike.
sentences.cn: 他画的奔马,栩栩如生,极其神似.

sentences.en: The horse he painted is very lifelike.
The mask was so lifelike it was quite frightening.
sentences.cn: 该面具非常逼真以至看起来有点恐怖.

sentences.en: The overlap of the mechanical and the lifelike increases year by year.
sentences.cn: 机械与逼真的重叠部分在一年年增加.

sentences.en: The painting depicted a hall so lifelike that a casual observer might believe himself to be looking through an open door.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘的厅堂如此逼真，若不细看，还真以为是从一扇开着的门往里看呢。

sentences.en: The portrayal of the characters in the novel is lifelike.
sentences.cn: 该书中的人物写得有血有肉.

sentences.en: They are famous for the lifelike reality of their paintings.
sentences.cn: 他们因对事物的描绘几乎接近真实而出名.

sentences.en: This bed sheet punch and judy show is lifelike, exciting.
sentences.cn: 此被单木偶戏表演惟妙惟肖, 扣人心弦.

words.tran_cn: 无生命的；死气沉沉的；无趣味的

trans.tran_cn: 活像真的，栩栩如生的，逼真，传神
trans.tran_en: a lifelike picture, model etc looks exactly like a real person or thing
